title: Hitou Meguri Kakure Yu
synopsis: Mikio returns to his hometown for the first time in half a year. The first thing he sees is the traditional Japanese onsen inn managed by Yukino Chitose, childhood friend and one-time lover.
related_anime: ['Hitou Meguri Kakure Yu: Mao-hen', 'Hitou Meguri The Animation: Wakaokami, Rachiru']
